summary: REQ-48 has been successfully implemented. The Footer component now displays all four social media links (Facebook, YouTube, Instagram, WhatsApp Channel) with the exact URLs specified in the BuildRequest. All links open in new tabs with proper security attributes (target='_blank' rel='noopener noreferrer'), maintain bilingual label support using LanguageContext, and preserve existing icon styling with hover effects. No missing requirements or hallucinated features detected.
